title.rendered: Aqualis ASA : Mandatory notification of trade

content.rendered:
Oslo, 21 August 2014

BHB Capital Management AS, a company controlled by Bjørn Håvard Brænden, Director Norway at Aqualis, has today acquired 8’420 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 10.60 per share. After this transaction Bjørn Håvard Brænden, and related parties, hold 292’331 shares in Aqualis.

*****

Contact:

Christian Opsahl
CFO
+47 901 101 53
christian.opsahl@aqualisbraemar.com

This information is subject of the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Tristein merges with AqualisBraemar
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 4 February 2015 – Aqualis ASA (OSE: Aqua) has decided to merge the operations of Tristein AS into AqualisBraemar AS. Oslo-listed Aqualis ASA acquired Norwegian company Tristein AS in April 2014. Tristein has since operated as a stand-alone entity as part of the Aqualis Group. Now the company is being…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aibel signs up AqualisBraemar for risk analyses
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 13 March 2017 – AqualisBraemar has been contracted by Aibel to conduct human factors analyses for a number of the EPC contractor’s ongoing projects on the Norwegian continental shelf. Under the contract, AqualisBraemar’s risk management specialists will conduct human factors analyses of Aibel’s work on the Snorre Expansion Project, the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA : Successful listing on Oslo Børs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: NOT FOR RELEASE, PUBLICATION OR DISTRIBUTION, IN WHOLE OR IN PART DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, IN AUSTRALIA, CANADA, JAPAN OR THE UNITED STATES Oslo, 13 August 2014 Aqualis Offshore Holding ASA (“New Aqualis”, together with its subsidiaries the “New Aqualis Group”) is pleased to announce its successful listing on Oslo Børs…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Disclosure of Shareholding
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Bjørn Stray has on 27 January 2021 purchased 720,000 shares in AqualisBraemar LOC ASA (“AqualisBraemar LOC”). Following the transaction, Bjørn Stray holds 4,767,743 shares in AqualisBraemar LOC, corresponding to 5.15% of the shares outstanding calculated based on a total share count of 92,547,583.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Mandatory notification of trade in Aqualis ASA
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Philip Alan Lenox, Director Asia Pacific in Aqualis, acquired 176'654 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 9.77 per share on 2 June 2015. After this transaction Philip Alan Lenox, and related parties, hold 878'944 shares in Aqualis ASA. Immediate notification was not made to Aqualis' management following the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Major shareholder disclosure in Aqualis ASA by BidCo af 6 dec 2018 AB
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We hereby declare that BidCo af 6 dec 2018 AB as per 24th May 2019 indirectly holds 1 389 614 shares and votes in Aqualis ASA through Danica Pension Försäkringsaktiebolag. This holding represents 3.28566 % of the total share capital and of voting rights in Aqualis ASA. BidCo is flagging…
